Description:
Urban Oasis with Designer Flair
A spectacular transformation of a quintessential Victorian cottage delivers an exceptionally stunning home boasting natural light, designer appointments and spirited interiors which create a bold, brilliant statement. Beyond a high front fence, secure gate and Tiffany Blue front door, the thoughtfully considered floorplan showcases a long hallway leading to a central lounge and dining room with custom cabinetry, original mid-century Venini Triadi prism wall sconces and a leafy side courtyard. The gleaming separate kitchen with abundant storage, gas cooking, dishwasher, breakfast bar and servery window opens to a supremely private garden oasis, fully decked for alfresco dining with rear access to the laneway. Two double bedrooms with in-built robes and decorative open fireplaces are serviced by an exquisite bathroom with marble tiled flooring, vintage mid-century Vitossi Murano glass chandelier and concealed laundry facilities. Gas ducted heating throughout, period detailing and inclusions such as a Fenton & Fenton wire chandelier in the main bedroom and bespoke made to order hall runner add character and comfort. With easy access to Fawkner Park, Grosvenor Reserve (secure children’s playground), Renown Kindergarten, Prahran Market and South Yarra Station plus trams, shops, dining and entertainment on Chapel Street, Commercial and Toorak Roads, the location is simply unbeatable.
